availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram Preston (Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky, wharf boat driver)

body.p: Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky, wharf boat driver. Kentucky native. Son of Henry Preston and Elizabeth Preston. Married to Mary Jane Myers in Boyd County, Kentucky on December 31, 1863. Farmer in Lawrence County, Kentucky in 1850. Wharf boat driver in Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 102A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 811.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Boyd County Marriages, Film #000344011, p. 68.
